messages.messageBody:
on 4/12/03 1:18 AM, Tia Leschke at leschke@... wrote:

> Are there more than two volumes of that yet? We have the first two, but
> they only go through Roman times (I think).

The 3rd one came out recently. It goes from "The Rise of Arabia to the
Renaissance."

Joyce
